about_the_game:
When you wake up in a world overrun by zombies and incomprehensible creatures that seem to have been thrown together in this bizarre place, the only thing you can do is survive. Scavenge for resources, work with other players who could be your allies or enemies and face unpredictable environments with each boundary you cross. You'll have to adapt quickly, whether it's a city, a forest, or something even stranger. But remember, the zombies won’t stop hunting you down until you kill them or they kill you.

Explore

Venture into a diverse and complex world where each environment is distinct and disconnected. As you cross boundaries—like a wall—you’ll find yourself in an entirely different world, whether it’s a dense forest beyond a cityscape or a surreal transition. Your task is to gather resources, build shelters, and survive in this unpredictable landscape, all while dealing with other players who could be either allies or foes. Band together to face terrifying obstacles, such as relentless zombies that will hunt you down without rest until you’re dead.

Survive

Survive everything that can kill you—from ravenous hordes of zombies to dehydration, starvation, and other players who could be either allies or enemies. Your goal is to make it past the towering wall to whatever lies on the other side, with no idea of what awaits you. All you can do is wonder where this world you’re trapped in really is.

Reward

Earn rewards by killing zombies and gaining a ticket to buy food, weapons, and gear to keep pushing forward. Face waves of zombies as you strive to survive in each round, all the way until you reach the other side of the wall.

Build

Sometimes, the place where you are may be far from the SAFE ZONE. Building a base is a good idea to store items and protect yourself from the outside world. It is essential for survival.

DON'T SHOOT!

Be cautious of vehicles marked with red spray paint. If any damage is done to these cars, an alarm will go off, and that's bad news—it will attract zombies to attack you.

When you encounter these vehicles along your path, you should either avoid them or face the challenge. However, if you manage to take them out, you'll gain access to what's inside. A battery could be one of the essential items for your survival.

Trap

Use your surroundings to your advantage. Setting up traps might be a good idea when they attack you.

Electric traps: These traps are scattered around town. When you activate them, don't go near them or you'll be the one to end up here.

Crafting traps to use is easy and they're very effective.

Repeat And Repeat

When you die, everything you’ve accumulated will reset—your zombie kill points, resources, and weapons will be gone unless you have a Ticket to give yourself a head start in your next survival attempt

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages. Frequent violence or bloodshed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Step into DEAD METRO, where each boundary hides a new world. Survive relentless zombies, shifting landscapes, and unpredictable alliances. Adapt or perish.
